sentences.en: A term in prison will concentrate his mind wonderfully.
sentences.cn: 一想到要被判刑，他的头脑就会变得非常清醒。
她的触摸令人感到很宽心.

sentences.en: It's a system that works wonderfully well.
sentences.cn: 该系统运转得十分顺畅。
她有一双极富表情的眼睛。

sentences.en: She was always wonderfully kind to me.
Somehow the place even smelt wonderfully nostalgic.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么，这个地方竟透出一种浓郁的怀旧气息。

sentences.en: The piano concerto was wonderfully rendered.
sentences.cn: 这首钢琴协奏曲演奏得很好.

sentences.en: The sun - dried tomatoes give the dish a wonderfully rich flavor.
sentences.cn: 晒干的番茄使这道菜味道特别浓郁.

sentences.en: The terracotta tiled floor gives the place a wonderfully homely character.
sentences.cn: 陶瓦地板使这个地方给人一种非常舒适温馨的感觉。

sentences.en: The water was cold and wonderfully refreshing.
There's wonderfully lyrical flute solo in the middle of this symphony.
sentences.cn: 在交响乐中间有一段奇妙的抒情长笛独奏.

sentences.en: Wonderfully melodic and tuneful, his songs have made me weep.
sentences.cn: 他的歌旋律优美、悦耳动听，让我潸然泪下。

trans.tran_cn: 精彩地，极好地，惊人地，奇妙地
